title: Sean Kelly predicts Tadej Pogačar might run out of gas during this Tour de France: ‘He might start to suffer’
content:
Former world number 1 and Eurosport commentator predicts disrupted preparation might yet cost Pogačar: 'Vingegaard still has something to give in this race.'

Read the full article at Sean Kelly predicts Tadej Pogačar might run out of gas during this Tour de France: ‘He might start to suffer’ on Velo.
author: sstokes
